segments.advisor_message: Okay, so let’s talk about your income. Can you tell me what type of income you receive? Like, uh, salary, rental income, you know, just give a brief description of that.
segments.client_message: Yeah, um, I have this job, right, and I earn like, um, five thousand a month, but it's, uh, gross income, so before taxes and stuff, you know? It’s, uh, usually every month I get it. But, um, I think also the rental income from my apartment, it’s like, um, two thousand, but that’s after tax, you know what I mean?
